articles.description: Sharekhan said Infosys is among the best-placed companies to benefit from strong demand backed by its strategic investments in scaling up digital capabilities, gaining market share and expanding presence in Europe.
articles.content:
Shares of tech services major Infosys gained for the third straight session, rising 2 percent on December 23, to hit a lifetime high of Rs 1,860 on the BSE.

articles.title: Russia is not readying military invasion of Ukraine, Russian envoy tells paper - Reuters
articles.description: Russia is not preparing a military invasion of Ukraine, its ambassador to the European Union was quoted as saying on Thursday, after Moscow unnerved the West with a massive troop build-up on its territory close to the Ukrainian border.

articles.title: EU sets nine-month validity period on current Covid certs for travel - Independent.ie
articles.description: The European Commission on Tuesday adopted rules that will make the European Union Covid-19 certificate valid for travel nine months after the completion of the primary vaccination schedule.
